docs.lead_paragraph: State Controller Arthur Levitt has asked the Federal Government to investigate the prices of three vital tranquilizing drugs that are used extensively in the state's mental institutions.

headline.main: Levitt Asks Inquiry on Price of Mental-Aid Drugs; State Controller Says They Are 'Clearly Overpriced' He Tells U.S. Tranquilizers Are Vital to Patients

docs.snippet: State Controller Arthur Levitt has asked the Federal Government to investigate the prices of three vital tranquilizing drugs that are used extensively in the state's mental  institutions.

docs.lead_paragraph: WASHINGTON, Jan. 8-Federal controls are being relaxed on 331 combination drugs that contain either a stimulant or a sedative and one or more other ingredients.

headline.main: U.S. Is Easing Curbs on Sale of Drugs

docs.abstract: Govt to ease Fed controls on 331 combination drugs containing a stimulant or sedative and 1 or more other ingredients Apr 1st; move follows rev of such drugs by FDA and US PHS panel; F Garfield, Drug Abuse Control Bur deputy dir, says effect sought by addicts obtaining drugs will be offset by effects of other ingredients
docs.snippet: WASHINGTON, Jan. 8-Federal controls are being relaxed on 331 combination drugs that contain either a stimulant or a sedative and one or more other ingredients.

byline.original: By HAROLD M. SCHMECK Jr. Special to The New York Times
